problem.p: One end of a horizontal spring is attached to a wall, while the other end is attached to a box that rests on a frictionless surface. The box is displaced from the equilibrium position and at t = 0 is released from rest. Select which of the following quantities will increase, decrease, or won't change the oscillation frequency if varied in the above situation.

li.p: Doubling the mass of the box.
Decreasing the initial displacement of the box.
Tilting the frictionless surface such that the wall is higher than the box.
